rows.label: qev086911_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well, we bought the stuff we had off some Nopon
traders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086911_MSG0003
rows.name: Why not start by asking them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086911_MSG0004
rows.name:
I imagine their source is some kind of trade secret,
so getting it out of them won't be easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086911_MSG0005
rows.name:
But they might let slip a rumor or two, at least?
Maybe you'll get lucky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086911_MSG0006
rows.name:
Construction work should be able to start up again just
as soon as they get that aerozium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086911_MSG0007
rows.name: I can't imagine it'll be easy to find, but good luck.[ST:wait ]
